article.headline: Idaho State 82, Sacramento State 81
article.story: POCATELLO, Idaho (AP) -- Scott Henry scored 19 points and pulled down 19 rebounds to lead Idaho State to an 82-81 victory over Sacramento State Thursday night. Marquis Poole blocked a 10-foot shot from the Hornets' Joseth Dawson with three seconds left to preserve the victory for the Bengals (8-10, 3-1 Big Sky). Poole had missed an off-balance shot with 31 seconds left. It was rebounded by Sacramento State (7-10, 1-3) and the Hornets set up for the final shot. Dawson let the clock run down before making his move cutting to the left of the key. Poole blocked the shot, got the ball and threw it up in the air as time expired. Sacramento State trailed 69-64 with seven minutes left before going on a 17-8 run to lead by two with 2:15 left. Jeff Gardner had 17 points for Idaho State including a 3-pointer with 2:05 remaining to give the Bengals an 80-78 lead. Joel Jones led the Hornets with 18 points.
